label: Balanced Index
description: This low-cost option leverages indexes to deliver a diverse and values-aligned investment portfolio.

label: Balanced Impact
description: This option offers a well-rounded exposure to renewable energy and social impact investments.

highlightInvestments.label: Vision Fund International
highlightInvestments.definition: Micro-finance products that promote financial inclusion in rural areas, particularly for people living in poverty

highlightInvestments.label: IIG Solar Asset Fund

label: Renewables Plus Growth
description: This option targets a 20% allocation to renewable energy and climate solutions, for a forward-thinking and environmentally conscious portfolio.

highlightInvestments.label: Juice Capital Energy
highlightInvestments.definition: Finances and develops solar energy projects

highlightInvestments.label: Green Squares Energy
highlightInvestments.definition: Organises leases, loans, and rentals of solar energy

label: High Growth
description: This option targets high allocation in growth investments such as Australian shares, international shares, and alternative assets.

highlightInvestments.label: Plenti
highlightInvestments.definition: A lending platform that helps people finance home solar systems and batteries.

highlightInvestments.label: The Nightingale Fund
highlightInvestments.definition: Helps create affordable housing and housing for essential workers in a sustainably designed apartment complex.

highlightInvestments.label: CIM The Impact Fund
